description: Hydrophilic interaction cellulose cartridges. For purification of glycans from a variety of complex mixtures including post-labeling cleanup of LudgerTag fluorophore and chromophore labeled glycans. This is the traditional post-labeling cleanup technology after fluorescent tagging of biopharmaceutical glycans with 2-AB (2-aminobenzamide). Each pack contains 6 cartridges.
name: LudgerClean S Cartridges
